title: Deals: AirPods Max $100 off, Twelve South Valentine’s Day sale, latest iPad Air, more
content:
Punxsutawney Phil has seen his shadow this Groundhog Day, which means a fresh batch of Apple deals are up for grabs. Headlining the deals is a $100 discount on all five AirPods Max colors, with a new Twelve South sale joining in on the savings. And last up, Apple’s latest iPad Air is also $99 off today. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: AirPods Max $100 off, Twelve South Valentine’s Day sale, latest iPad Air, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: All AirPods Max colors are now $100 off at Amazon, delivering rare price cuts on the entire lineup alongside iPad Air and other Apple gear.
